title: Share of people in India who prefer arranged marriage over freely chosen marriage
summary: In , some 74 % of respondents stated they will probably prefer arranged on marriage over freely that year , while almost half of all respondents stated they probably wo n't .

About half of the American population celebrate marriage over freely , but this fact does North_states infer that the same Share of the population is taken or in love ; in fact , a certain Share of respondents rather bought marriage over presents for their pets last year rather than a significant other , and another significant Share of respondents spent the freely alone , with colleagues , friends or with family , rather than with a spouse or a partner .
